name: ChangePasswordOldPwdNull
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for updating the admin password:

Request payload must contain the following fields:

user_id : STRING,
old_password: STRING,
new_password: STRING

Request:

PUT - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/students/changePassword

raw 
  {
    "user_id": "4",
    "old_password": "",
    "new_password": "1234567891011"
}

Response:

400 - Bad Request 

  {"status":400,"status_type":"error","message":"Bad Request","count":1,"errors":["Old Password cant not be null/empty"]}
